document_notes.text:
This update for ntfs-3g_ntfsprogs fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-52890: Fixed use-after-free in 'ntfs_uppercase_mbs' in unistr.c (bsc#1226007).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: NTFS-3G before 75dcdc2 has a use-after-free in ntfs_uppercase_mbs in libntfs-3g/unistr.c. NOTE: discussion suggests that exploitation would be challenging.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
